column2: Vichy Dercos Technique Anti-Dandruff Treatment Shampoo
column19:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • The Dercos Anti-Dandruff Shampoo by Vichy exfoliates visible dandruff from the very first application and helps to prevent its return. Remains efficient for up to six weeks after the treatment has been stopped.

  • Product Details

  • Anti-dandruff treatment shampoo with Selenium DS and Cohesyl that eliminates the fungal microorganism responsible for dandruff and removes dead cells to cleanse the scalp
    For normal to oily hair

  • Size & Fit

  • 200 ml
